pros: Positive work environment and great colleagues
cons: I don't have any cons to mention

review_title: Adolescent and Youth Empowerment and Participation Officer
pros: Great environment and room for growth. It is a job I look forward going to on Mondays and I would recommend it to everyone
cons: Bureaucracy is very big. For answers and decisions to even small things you need to wait for months so that can put off many people
